content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Trabelsi. Thank you for coming to Munich to see our apartment. We are open to discussing the rental price with you. What was your initial offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My initial offer is 400 Euro per month. I am willing to negotiate.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Trabelsi. We appreciate your interest in the apartment. We are looking to maximize our gains, so we would like to offer you a rental price of 450 Euro per month. Is this a price that you are willing to accept?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to accept the price of 450 Euro per month. I agree to the price of 450 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you, Mr. Trabelsi. We appreciate your willingness to accept the rental price of 450 Euro per month. We are glad to have you as a tenant and look forward to working with you. Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
